text: Anyone using snap app in HubSpot? currenlty we have it on a page and the conversions don’t show in HubSpot. Wondering if you were able to create a HS event to tie that in there. Anyone know how about to getting this setup?
and I’m wondering if there is something that can allow me to show an event as a conversion on a certain page — I’m not seeing it in here, wasn’t sure if that is a possibliity
